website_summaries.verdict: Elegant set with a recognizable logo comes in a range of colors, including muted shades like rose gold, and can be purchased separately or as a set.
pros: Molded case design is aimed at deflecting shock and offering impact resistance when in transit
The thoughtful interior design means you can pack a lot inside
cons: This case comes at a higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Beware of manufacture defects and give these bags a good test drive before your trip.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for a long trip to Europe. The bag has broken on my first flight from Cleveland to New York. One of the wheels (the one that is on the side where handle is) completely detached (see images). The item is no longer rolling, and I have to literally carry this 45 lbs bag. The worst thing about all these is that I can't even return it, as I'm in the middle of my trip. The only option I have is to buy some new bag and dump this one in my hotel room. Quite frustrating start of my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper and fabric disintegrated after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, and price seemed ok, but fabric and zipper completely disintegrated and there is no easy fix. Basically I ended up paying about $20 per round trip to use it. Warranty is not likely to repair or replace but it seems like it should have lasted under normal wear and tear, which includes loading and unloading on airplanes and taxis since it IS luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Puck

customer_reviews.title: Great bag overall!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carryon bag. It's small enough to fit the carryon restrictions (I flew with American Airlines and Southwest and had no problems) yet still big enough to fit a week's worth of clothes, a pair of flip flops, a pair of sneakers/joggers, a microfiber towel and my toiletries in it. I packed myou bag as full as I possibly could and the zipper held strong. The wheels were a dream, they made it so easy to push along the narrow isles on the plane. The shell of the suitcase is just as strong and durable. I would recommend this bag to anyone looking for a good quality yet still affordable bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 5 day excursion
customer_reviews.text: I just used this suitcase on my trip to Jamaica and it was perfect for a 5 day excursion. Also, it's bigger than other carry on suitcases as you can see in my photo.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyDude76

customer_reviews.title: Wheel fell off after first plane ride.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving the product 2 stars for the following reasons: The construction of the suitcase shell itself seems durable, has well made handles, and industrious zippers. However, the downfall is that the wheels are rather flimsy. I had a wheel bust off during the first plane ride and I was left hauling an awkward suitcase around the airport as the wheel dangled from the bottom. Read the reviews on this product. There are several reports of the wheels falling off, and it definitely seems like a reoccurring issue.
customer_reviews.author: Heidrich

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this set, really bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it one star because i had to in order to write a review. Please don’t waste your money. It’s not worth it. The large piece broke as I was getting the suitcase out the door to get to the airport. The second piece came out at the destination airport open with stuff out. I was very disappointed. I had and old KENNETH Cole suitcase that was similar to this set and it lasted for years, not so much on this set.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Cassel

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Theses should last a while. The set rolls easy in all directions. They came in a medium sized box. The smaller cases are stored in the largest case. They have handles on the top and sides. The inside has a small zippered pouch ( lotion, comb, etc). The inside also has one side that may be zipped all the way around, therefore protecting your clothes from whatever you put on the other side (shoes).
customer_reviews.author: Msro

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love this bag and other reviews had me excited
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this bag and other reviews had me excited. But when it was delivered there was a dent, a scrape and a crushed point which made me really question its durability. Still debating whether to exchange or return. I'll update if I exchange and have better news.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J

customer_reviews.title: Love these Kenneth Cole Reaction suitcases
customer_reviews.text: Love these Kenneth Cole Reaction suitcases! Super light-weight and hold a ton of stuff. Bought the hot pink for me and the dark blue for my husband. Just took them on a three week trip to Europe and they held up great. We also have the smaller size (maybe 24" or so) of the same brand that we each took to China for three weeks a couple of years ago. After numerous flights and baggage handlers, they too are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the money
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife for valentines day, as her previous set was mismatched and old. For the money it is a great looking, high quality set with a 10 year warranty. One note, these are much more blue, and less violet than in the picture if that is something that matters. UPDATE Took our first trip and they behaved very well. They are very light, roll well, and look great. The one downside (and this is probably true of any ABS luggage) is the outside of the large one has some surface scratches now from being checked and travelling.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hajjar

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional At All
customer_reviews.text: This bag is extremely narrow, so you can't fit a lot in it. Plus the space where the handle inserts takes a lot of room inside so you can fit even less in it. PLUS when you do put things inside the bag the handle doesn't pull out and gets stuck. So it's only a functional handle...when the bag is empty. I rarely return anything, but I am going through the hassle to do so here.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Wente

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a carry-on that wouldn't cost me an arm or a leg, and I was tired of all the junk luggage that has flooded the market. No, this isn't a Delsey bag. But it's sturdy and well-built. It's stylish for a man and easy to travel with. I take it everywhere, and it hasn't had a single issue so far. I'll definitely be buying another one if I ever need to.
customer_reviews.author: Sneaky PotatoTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small lightweight carry on
customer_reviews.text: The Kenneth Cole Reaction 20" is a very nice small hard shell carry on that will fit on almost any passenger jet in use today. Despite its small size, I manage to pack a decent amount of stuff into it. It's perfect for a short 3-4 day trip. The case is well made and looks good. The outside shell is ABS plastic with reinforced corners. It seems very durable despite its light weight. The 4 wheels makes it easy to maneuver. The retractable handle is smooth. For the price, this is an all around excellent carry on. It is much nicer than the cheaper carry on it replaced, and I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trips 5 days or less -- very durable -- 60+ trips -- 2+ years and counting
customer_reviews.text: I have used this suitcase for 2+ years traveling extensively (60+ trips) and it still dominates. It's size allows me to carry-on onto any airline or airplane, specifically the smaller ones that require larger carry-on bags to gate check or pink-tag. No issues with durability -- I've stressed, strained, and weighted it down with extra personal items and it has held up wonderfully. The zippers are especially durable. It's probably a bit small for trips greater than 5 days in duration but that's the price you pay for a smaller style carry-on -- it's not rocket science. Besides, 95% of us over-pack anyways. And if you say you don't, you do.
customer_reviews.author: A-A-Ron

customer_reviews.title: Wheel broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Total POS. Wheel broke off on a two day trip. It never even went through airport baggage. It was with me the whole time. The wheel broke when I rolled over a crack in a concrete sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying 2 of these for my upcoming flight. My main concern was the size with the airline size restrictions. Our flights went through without any problems/ concerns from flight staff. These were used on domestic fights only. Luggage worked great and the only real complaint I have is there is no outside access/zippers/pockets to grab last minute items or tickets. I'm 6'3" and didn't have any problem toting this around the several different airports. Luggage worked smoothly over carpet and other flooring. I believe this was a good investment. I would buy them again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JERRYRN

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this luggage. The exterior is pink and the inside has a grey lining to it. It comes with lock holes and although the luggage looks secure on its own, I bought a black luggage start just in case. I've used this three times for my travels. It carried 44-47lbs of weight for all three trips. The luggage is still in a like-new condition. Extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CHAI

customer_reviews.title: so I couldnt return it when I realized how much I hated it. I guess I'll use it as storage ...
customer_reviews.text: Big and HEAVY.... and flimsy. Trying to close it when its empty is very frustrating as it wants to close in on itself because the top is so heavy and the zipper is weak. I used it once on a business trip and made the mistake of writing my name on it, so I couldnt return it when I realized how much I hated it. I guess I'll use it as storage now. Very disappointed. Expected better from Kenneth Cole brand
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: I loved this bag
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag, even though i had a little trouble getting the extension handle to fully extend on my return flight (i had zero issues on it's maiden voyage). I suspect that it may have to do with how stuffed it was which may have caused an issue with the handle as it retracts into the case itself, i think it's an awesome bag for a light packer or a short trip. But anything over 5/6 days would require either a larger bag or an accompaniment bag. Otherwise, AWEsome bag dudes
customer_reviews.author: KeithDavid

customer_reviews.title: Like it but there is a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for about a year and have traveled with it for about 4+months. It's light, durable, and a great price. I like it except for one design flaw. 2 little tap screws hold the plastic handle to the extension bars. The screws work loose and get lost. If you tighten them they tend to strip their holes easily. I've asked for replacement screws or a replacement case - we'll see about the response. For this case when new, I recommend a little glue in the screw holes - careful not to over-tighten - as a preventative. Update: The manufacturer replied to an email about the problem and is sending a replacement for the bag. Great, rapid service!
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: This set looks really nice. The colour is exactly what I wanted and ...
customer_reviews.text: This set looks really nice. The colour is exactly what I wanted and expected. The quality isn't worth a buck though. A one way trip from the U.S. to the Caribbean and it's already scuffed and one of the wheels on the largest piece split in two -_- There's a reason the price is what it is. I doubt I'll get more than a few round trips out of this set. I do not recommend this product. Three starts because it isnt expensive, came on time and looks as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Anika

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk. Very flimsy sides, no locking mechanism, and the zipper broke...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. Very flimsy sides, no locking mechanism, and the zipper broke the first time I closed it. Of course it happened the night I am leaving so I can't return it and won't be back until after the return date. Forced to buy another one from the store when I already am short on time to begin with. Very, very unhappy with this suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Wheels
customer_reviews.text: I loved the looks, spinners, sturdy handle, price, and compartments of this. However, after 6 months of regular travel with great care taken, the wheel came loose on the axle. As a result, the wheel wore down and is now lopsided and won't roll correctly with the spinners. I wrote customer service but they would not help, and they don't sell replacement wheels. If you travel a few times/year, than this is for you. If you travel regularly, this won't hold up - don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Keys

customer_reviews.title: Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about your product. I bought it because I needed it for my next travel. As soon the case came out on Luggage belt, I saw that it lost a wheel and the other one, is almost brocket. Now, I need to buy another case here in Caracas. Bad product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rui M Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost three years so I think I can say with some confidence this is a well made product. I've used it for flights and camping trips and it looks brand new. All mechanical parts are still working fine (zippers, wheels, clips, handle) and the exterior shell has no dents and only a few minor scratches. The interior lining has no holes or tears and I've packed it tight with shoes, laptop/chargers, outerwear, headphones, hygiene products, and other things that could have damaged it by now. It's lightweight and very easy to maneuver (rolls just fine on two wheels when going down the narrow airplane aisle for example). It's my go-to luggage, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ranchwilder

customer_reviews.title: Cute and small.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Durable feel. Too small for our needs. The handles take up a significant amount of packing space. We went with a carry on that met the requirements and had much more room and compartments. But this would work for someone who needs something easy to use for a 3 day trip. Can be great for very small children too. Measurements are much less then the claimed 22 x 14 x 9 I dont recall exactly but It is more like 20 x 13 x 8. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: pap3

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, lightweight and sturdy luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, lightweight and sturdy luggage set! The Dark color is great to hide any scratches if you travel frequently. It's not expandable (the only con to this set) but overall good for the stylish traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Raaven

customer_reviews.title: Good for a 2-3 day trip but is bad quality and broke
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase did not last for even five months. The ergonomics are uncomfortable both on your hand and also if you are are a taller 6'+ you will find yourself being "run over​" by it. The wheel and axle assembly have come apart and during the middle of an international trip. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out $60
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this item. Purchased 2 months in advance for a trip to Cabo I had over Thanksgiving, used it once on that trip and on my way back home my handle broke. Since the size is great and color is beautiful I attempted an exchange. Unfortunately since I had purchase it ahead of time it was denied. My suggestion is purchasing this item elsewhere with a better warranty/exchange Policy in the event this is a faulty item. This wasn’t a mismanagement from my part, as I have larger luggage’s, faulty product and now I’m out $60.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieJ_

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The handle itself once fully extended seems flimsy enough as to where I almost guarantee that it will break. The waterproof weatherstripping that runs the length of the zipper causes the zipper itself not to be able to round the corners of the case. This is why I'm guessing most people break their zippers. You have to pry the lip of that strip to make sure that the zipper can move freely. For a cheap carry on, I think it suits a light trip perfectly. As a check in bag, this would most certainly be destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: E. McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Very compact luggage. I wouldn't recommend it for europe though due to its wheels and cubble stones
customer_reviews.text: Very compact luggage. I wouldn't recommend it for europe though due to its wheels and cubble stones. Mine was great to travel in the US, I loved it as it is sturdy yet very compact. I brought it to Florence and due to the streets and sidewalks being so rough, one of the wheels' metsl axis melted the wheel mount. So, great for US, don't buy it for europe. Get something with very sturdy wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Piko

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice with some functionality issues
customer_reviews.text: I travel over half the year for work. This bag looks great. It is on the small side, good for light 3-5 day trips. It does not expand. If you’re ok with those things, you should note it also comes with some functionality issues: 1) the handle is too short, so your heel will often clip the bag as you walk. 2) the wheels suck, not very smooth for a 4 wheeler. Upright mobility is frustrating as the wheels will not easily adjust with your movement. If you can live with these things, it is a good (not great) bag considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the pink one, and so far with two flights under our belt, it's holding up nicely. Very sturdy and the wheels roll and spin easily. Also, this thing is easy to spot and super cute. I saw several woman eyeing it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: dashapete

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy from any other manufacturer now
customer_reviews.text: We had the larger version of this suitcase and when it was damaged (one of the wheels broke off during a trip), I called Kenneth Cole to see if I could buy a replacement but instead, they replaced the whole suitcase free of charge. I just had to send a couple of photos of the damage and the model number and the new one arrived within a week. I was so impressed, it was a no-brainer to buy from them again when I needed the carry-on size. The suitcase itself is great. Well built, attractive and with the warranty, worry free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for Christmas for myself (wished they had purple or lavender). I bought them because we 3 each needed a good carry-on, but guess what, I have used it twice since Christmas and United said it was too big for a carry-on. Had to pay an extra $60.00 for round trip. Don't care for United for that reason. I think they changed their size so a person has to give them a little more of their money. Our Grandson & I are flying Southwest to Arizona in a few days. At least I know they will be free. Southwest no longer flies some places but whenever, I will take them. Very good size.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Micucci

customer_reviews.title: broken within six months of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this luggage to replace my prior carry-on bag from Samsonite that had lasted over 15 years and and traveled over a million airline miles. This replacement bag was exclusively used as carry on and never subjected to baggage handling or automated equipment. Within six months (about 10 trips) the pop up handle plastic weakened and broke, rendering the bag useless. I'm going back to a Samsonite.
customer_reviews.author: A. Radin

customer_reviews.title: My Air-Commuter Luggage Go-To Piece.
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage piece. I travel every single week and this is my go to piece for the last 12 weeks. No issues at all. I can fit 6 days of business casual clothing with a little space left over. This definitely fits in airplane carry-on bins. Only reason I knocked a star off was because some of the interior space is taken up by where the collapsible handle folds into. Other than that, I highly recommend this durable, small-but-not-too-small, roller-bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rojo

customer_reviews.title: handle broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I took this bag on 4 trips. On the very first trip, the handle started to break -- it became loose and the locking mechanism started to fail. This last trip, the handle ripped completely off one of the bars at the screw, and now my suitcase is super broken. I'm not an insane traveler. I'm reasonably gentle with my suitcases. I don't carry around weights, or really much of anything other than clothes. Don't get me wrong, it's adorable and fits a ton. If it lasted, it would get 5 stars, but instead, here we are. Go buy something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Case

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kids last Christmas so they could have "real" suitcases. I was happy with them when they came out of the box. Perfect size for two kids and they look great. My daughter loved the pink. However, we used it for the first time this past week for our summer vacation. It didn't even make leg one of the flight. The handle broke and the repair will cost us what the bag did so I'm going to call this one a loss. Hopefully, the other bag survives when we use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Lots of internal space, but handle only lasted about 8 trips
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this little carry-on while it worked - lots of internal space, loved the 4 spinning wheels and ease of rolling. However, after just 8 trips the handle broke - the little metal rods that lock the extension bars into place at the various positions failed, and it won't extend or shorten anymore, it's just stuck at the halfway point. I've owned it for 4 years, but only used it 8 times - and that seems like a small amount of use.
customer_reviews.author: JonShar

customer_reviews.title: It's a good carry-on size
customer_reviews.text: Cute little suitcase. I bought it for my daughter. She loves the color. It's a good carry-on size, and the hard case protects the contents. Basic inside. Nice that it had a handle on the side. The wheels do spin in any direction, so it does work in any direction you want to go with it. The wheels are functional. Fairly smooth, but definitely not as good as 8 wheels, and I don't foresee the wheels lasting too long. However, for the price and convenience of the purchase, I'm happy with it. It handled well on the streets of Paris, NYC and London.
customer_reviews.author: Anh S.

customer_reviews.title: Handle fell off first time we used it!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even remove the tags or use this on an actual trip, and the handle broke off! Gave this as a Christmas gift to my son, and only used it to transport a few extra Christmas gift items from my parents home back to ours after opening presents and the handle broke off the first time we tried to pull it. Very cheaply made. Glad we didn’t use it for our upcoming trip to Europe!
customer_reviews.author: Deena Wright

customer_reviews.title: I issue a DO NOT BUY on these, but customer service is great
customer_reviews.text: TRASH TRASH TRASH. DO NOT BUY. Both units had problems on The FIRST TRIP!! Small one would lock the handle in the UP position and require unzipping the inside and manually manipulating the device. The larger one had a broken zipper AND a torn zipper flap. The only reason it gets 2 stars versus 1 is that the company replaced them with no complaints, with a slightly "better" model. No refunds though, so beware.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: So far, money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to write a review until this had been On a few trips. I travel 3-5 times a month for work. It’s all domestic flights but my luggage takes a beating. I have had this luggage for nearly a month now, and has been on 6 plane rides, 4 airports and a few car rides. It has held up well. Will update review in a few months time to comment on durability. Update- I have been on about 13 air plane trips (domestic) and many road trips with the larger bag. Has held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Madeira16

customer_reviews.title: Light, sturdy, handles well on public transportation.
customer_reviews.text: My teen had a school, two night stay, trip and it was great. She received many compliments. It fit a jumbo bath sheet towel, flannel pjs, toiletries, two dresses, undies, socks, sneakers, bathing suit with room to spare. It was little but kinda like Hermiones bag, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Obey Bae

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Lightweight set of luggage !
customer_reviews.text: I got these kenneth cole 3-piece set of luggage (Navy Color). Its really beautifull (as pictured in description). From outside its looks small but can hold good quantity of items considering the international luggage limits. These are lightweight so you can fit more of your items needed for your travel. Will update the toughness details once travel plans resumes to normal P.S: I also purchased the additional warranty coverage along with it. Hope, It'll not required to call them :)
customer_reviews.author: Anushri

customer_reviews.title: European travel - held more than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: Just did a week in Europe with this bag as I knew we were on 4 flights that I wanted to keep this as a carry on. This fit in Vueling Airlines, RyanAir, and Norwegian with no issues at all. I am fairly tall at 6'2" and was able to have a pair of slacks and jeans, several shirts, dress shoes, sports coat, light sweater, and all the other essentials in this small case without the hassle of needing to check it in. We walked around London and Barcelona for over 4 hours and the wheels held up great.
customer_reviews.author: C Graham

customer_reviews.title: MY KENNETH COLE CARRY ON SUITCASE
customer_reviews.text: Hello Everyone Well my morning started very good. I just received my Kenneth Cole Carry on suitcase. Came right on time. So far though is kind of early to rate everything looks good so far. Very nice as well a light. However what I love most is size of it not too big not too small it's perfect. Just pack up a few things and just get away for a week or two weeks. My carry on is the perfect size as well as the perfect height. As days go by I will keep you guys posted. Once again thank you I will rate this carry on suitcase a perfect 5 excellent quality and enough space.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra A. Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and all around great set
customer_reviews.text: My last set was always problematic at best. This is a fantastic luggage set at a reasonable price. So often it seems that you’re making the choice between luggage that is either durable or lightweight. These suitcases really address that problem very well. The only problem I have had and the main reason I give them a 4 star is the zippers. I felt they were a bit cheap and had them split while I was traveling. Luckily I was able to fix it and continue on my way. The only other issue I had was I really do think that these should have built in TSA locks.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. Looks like this was either refurbished or just a piece of s***. Zipper pulls missing from both sides, ripped zippered centered with glue everywhere. The outside numbers look used. Clearly a knock-off, but I didn’t care about the label. If we didn’t have to catch a flight in less than two days I would be sending it straight back. Hope it holds up on our flight.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beach getaway!
customer_reviews.text: Love my little suitcase. Fits easily into an overhead compartment without those bulky pockets. Held what I needed for a 1 week Mexico vacation!...Though I do pack light! It held 2 pairs of sandals, 1 pair of low profile sneakers, work out shorts and shirt, 4 bikinis, 2 coverups, 2 shorts, 4 t-shirts, and 3 dresses and undies. Plus cosmetic and small personal items.
customer_reviews.author: Monnye F.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible wheels
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a carry on once this summer and again this fall. The bag has never been checked, always carried on the two times it was used and one of the wheels doesn’t roll properly so I cannot use it as a four wheel suitcase. I have to tilt it on just two wheels and even then it rolls horrible. I regret buying this suitcase, but regret even more than my first trip I used it was just a few days past the 30 day return window.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A.

customer_reviews.title: High quality solution I wish I bought earlier
customer_reviews.text: I travel every week on domestic flights and needed a lightweight suitcase to carry on. This is perfect!! It's flown with me for 2 months now every week and has held up wonderfully. It is super small and though I can carry a larger suitcase on this is much easier to maneuver and it is very lightweight for hoisting into overhead compartments. I can fit a week of clothes and 2 pairs of shoes easily into this. I highly recommend for travelers
customer_reviews.author: Jencat

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE carry-on bag!
customer_reviews.text: This little carry-on bag is AMAZING! It has four wheels (most I have found have two)- it makes it so easy to push around. It also has a great side handle and top handle (for lifting up). My children each have one and love it too. I was able to pack: 3 small sweatshirts, 3 small long sleeve shirts, 4 pairs of socks and underwear, 2 sets of pajamas, 2 pairs of leggings and 1 pair of tennis shoes. I have ordered three “charcoal” bags. The color is great. (I will include pictures- does not come with yellow bag-tag pictured!). Can not recommend this bag enough!
customer_reviews.author: BRat

customer_reviews.title: A spunky travel companion
customer_reviews.text: My suitcase has been scratched, thrown, and stuffed with way more things that it was built for (we're talking about multiple sweaters, jackets, pants, shirts, dresses, suits--enough for a four-day conference and an additional five days of traveling in Europe in March). It has even fallen down a couple stairs. It has a few battle scars but no cracks yet. It still works as well as when I first bought it. I got the pink one and the color is exactly as depicted in the photo, not to mention how much it stands out on the baggage carousel.
customer_reviews.author: VERY GOODBee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Great carry-on. Fits in every overhead bin of every major airline I've flown on. Durable and stylish. I will never go back to 2-wheel carry-ons every again. *******UPDATE***** 6/15/16 Ok. So I have used this bad boy for trips all over the place. It is STURDY!! I just finished packing for a TEN DAY camping trip, and I managed to get all of this in the bag no problem: -pair of jeans -10 tshirts -10 boxers -6 pairs of socks -2 books -large revolver -box of ammo -toothbrush and toothpaste -deodorant -playing cards -hand towel -water filtration kit -extra large/thick hoodie -soap -shampoo -binoculars -3 flashlights Get this bag already!!
customer_reviews.author: John from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Forces me to pack the perfect amount of clothing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a cheap suitcase prop for a photoshoot. It's smaller than any other carryon I've ever owned and yet I fell in love. After packing and bringing along for one destination photoshoot I realized it forces me to pack the perfect amount of clothing. It's now my regular suitcase and my friend that I travel with is ordering one. I've taken on quick business trips, weekend trips and a two week vacation in Europe. Served me well in all instances.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase-just the right size for our trip to France ...
customer_reviews.text: Great suitcase-just the right size for our trip to France and Iceland-very heavy duty without being too heavy, well made zippers and wheels. Love the divider with zippered cover inside. So much room it fit all my clothing for two very different occasions and with plenty room for heavy sweaters, socks thermals etc. Passed Icelandair's strict luggage rules.
customer_reviews.author: J.M. Florida

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: The 20 inch is just a bit too small, 22" would be better. The wheels do not last very long, they are already binding and not moving easily. The pull handle is now getting a bit stuck. Overall, this doesn't hold up and it's past the return time, so I'll probably donate it. Have had it less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldwater

customer_reviews.title: I will try to get this dealt with through warranty but that is not easy to determine
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase seems durable but after the first trip one of the wheels fell off. I will try to get this dealt with through warranty but that is not easy to determine. I've had other suitcase with similar wheels with no issue. This is sad for the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J Orner

customer_reviews.title: Great Carry On
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from a 4 day trip. Ordered two of these bags, one for me (Dk Purple) and one for hubby (Navy). This luggage was just what we needed. Held everything with plenty of space to spare. Checked our bags and they held up perfectly. Easy to roll over tile and carpet at airport. They would have fit in the overhead bins in airplane, but as flight was full, space in overheads was limited, so we checked the bags. Seems to be well made, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Loose handle HOWEVER over all love the luggage! Perfect carry on size!
customer_reviews.text: Love this luggage for my 8 year old daughter. Very durable but due to color id recommend getting a luggage cover because it does get marked up from being mishandled by airline. The only thing I would also mention is handle seems slightly loose, but has no effect on maneuvering luggage... Highly recommended! Daughter and I got matching pair...
customer_reviews.author: Cheril polo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking piece of "carry on"
customer_reviews.text: Great looking piece of "carry on"...The handle won't stay up when extended, that is disappointing to say the least...The wheels don't roll/swivel cleanly while pulling, making "rolling" impossible...Its true, you get what you pay for and there are no "deals" ...Back to "square one" for me...
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Bialick

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I travel for work and for fun a lot and this has survived well so far! It made it to Miami as a checked United bag. And made it through a two week Ireland road trip. It is lightweight so I can easily carry it around, but the swivel wheels are helpful. I like the zippered side a lot for loose clothing and then use packing cubes on the other side for heavy clothes and shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY What I Was Looking For To Carry On AND "fit" perfectly in the metal Airline rack you use to see if your bag will meet their requirements. I Did want one with the 4 wheels I Did want one that had handles on top & side I Did want 2 different colors :) I Did NOT want one that expanded (for size requirement purposes) ALWAYS Check Airline size requirements on THEIR Website before flight.....No Point In Being Stressed Out Later :)
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon Ellenburg

customer_reviews.title: Outside holds up to damage but zipper split w/ checking bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the outside seemed like it would hold up to getting bumped around if I ever checked it which it did (awesome) but I’m disappointed the zipper split during my first travel with it. Thankfully it zipped back up after I got it off the carousel but the thought of my belongings spewing out frightens me. Also sad it doesn’t have a lock but that’s my fault for not looking at the description before purchasing. This is also a popular bag so make sure you get a personal tag for it!
customer_reviews.author: CK650

customer_reviews.title: Not that much room
customer_reviews.text: I got this after reading the reviews, and it has worked just fine on the trips I have taken with it. I will say it is not as good as the last suitcase I had (but had to retire because after 10 years it was time for it to be retired). My main issue is that the capacity is not very large. For the outside, it has the same dimensions as my last cheap-y hard shell suitcase, but I cannot fit as much stuff in it (like one pair of shoes, two cardigans, and a purse less). It does look nice on the outside though.
customer_reviews.author: PallyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice little suitcase, love the maneuverability
customer_reviews.text: Very maneuverable suitcase, nice lines, sturdy, overall a good buy. I was quite happy when this arrived and still am months later. It isn’t exceptionally special but it does the job and I like the look. Are there better suitcases? Absolutely. Are there worse? Certainly. It’s a solid mid-priced option that won’t embarrass you or let you down. I loved the shave of gray, but that’s a personal preference, it’s very sleek. It has been durable over the last few months- I didn’t just buy it. I’ve had many flimsy suitcases that just don’t do the job. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Camille B.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 3 uses - Airport disaster
customer_reviews.text: I used this suitcase 3 times. On a flight from Chicago to Austin the fabric around the zipper ripped and the zipper came undone. When this bag came down the baggage carousel it had been placed in a plastic tub and completely split apart. It was a disaster trying to get this split open suitcase to my car. I tried to repair it when I got home but could not. My previous suitcase set lasted almost 20 years. This was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: interior volume and the colors are good but luggage durability is not yet tested
customer_reviews.text: Bought two new 20" Kenneth Cole Reaction luggage pieces. Amazon shipped it from Kentucky warehouse per label on the box. One pc Silver colored was definitely NOT new because it had a partially used OTC medicine in the luggage pocket inside; and the out side was not as bright finish as the other piece and had a washed off stain. The same Amazon ad has used items for sale at less price so I felt cheated. That luggage item is being returned. The size, interior volume and the colors are good but luggage durability is not yet tested.
customer_reviews.author: Purush

customer_reviews.title: Are great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I recently traveled to Cancun and returned. Going through the airport was a breeze. I controlled 2 of them with carry-on bags attached to the handles. I had no problem securing them, retrieving them from the luggage area and packing and unpacking them. Although I watched them being treated roughly there and back, they traveled perfectly (no dents, dings or gouges). I did place straps on them as an assist as I have seen how they are handled. Going to be traveling again soon and look forward to using them again. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Randall R. Emery

customer_reviews.title: Handle goes down
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my laptop, will also be good for travel whenever that happens again. My only complaint is the way the button is on the handle to raise and lower the handle it is hard to hang on to handle and walk or push it without hitting the button then the handle goes down. Constantly. Have to focus on trying to hang on to it in way that this doesn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Defective Handle on Case.
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT A FEW WEEKS BEFORE TRIP Finally used and the handle failed at the first airport (PBIA). Unable to extend so carried bag most of the time. Totally useless. Now I am told the window for exchanging it is closed. This is far from satisfactory. Not up to Amazon standards by a long chalk. Please give me satisfaction. Photo shows handle as it is now. Suitable for a five year old child. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Le Roi

customer_reviews.title: Terrific suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific suitcase! I took a trip to Italy and back, and this suitcase withstood all of the rough handling the airlines could throw at it. It doesn't even have a scratch on it! It rolls very well (even if it tends to try to roll off in its own direction at times), and the hard sides keep everything inside safe from being squashed or broken. Plus, with the hot pink shell, it is easy to spot at baggage claim. I am very happy with this purchase, and I hope the suitcase will last for many trips to come!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fly the friendly skies in style
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a short trip and didn't want to check my large suitcase. I like KC products and the price to review ratio for this carry on made it worth buying. It didn't disappoint. The only thing it did was if I leaned on the handle a certain way it would release and drop down. Not worth losing a star over because since it isn't a crutch when you are too lazy to stand. It fit a surprising amount of clothes and two men's size 12 shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Durk

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty.
customer_reviews.text: Small but mighty. So far this bag has traveled to Italy and the Netherlands, plus all over the Midwest. It is rugged and is used manly as carry on. Small to fit in the smallest overhead storage. light enough to stuff full of all your things. I was able to pack 7 days worth of clothes. One con is the wheels when running through the airports on all four wheels they tend to wander to the left. Not sure if this is a balance issue or a lazy wheel...
customer_reviews.author: JeCr

customer_reviews.title: Best Luggage ever
customer_reviews.text: I needed a traveling set very durable and attractive for my trip to Brazil. This set did withstand the hustle and bustle that goes with the territory of traveling. Everyone praised how lovely the luggage looked and the stunning color. I still take it on plane and bus travel with me. Very easy to store away as well. I haven't had any scratches or cracks form on them so far, apparently they are holding up well. The price was very affordable when I bought two years ago. This is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: All Natural Lady

customer_reviews.title: LOVED THIS
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express how much I enjoyed having this for my travels. So light, easy to use, sturdy for what you pay for. I love the hard exterior; it made it so much comforting during this covid-19 time when I had to travel for family. I could easily wipe off my suitcase and it didn't show any marks; dents etc..and I was throwing it up into the storage bins of the plane. The color is true to picture, I love teal and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Brady

customer_reviews.title: Broken on our first trip
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t make it one trip without breaking. Going to see if Amazon will let us return them. Had high hopes for this brand after hearing good things. Update: Amazon let us return for a almost complete refund. So it was not a total loss. I ended up buying Away bags much more expensive but way more sturdy and have a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Q

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for an international trip, after reading reviews I thought it would be a great investment. It completely only two legs of the trip. When I picked it up from baggage claim the zipper was busted out, only held together by the zipper ends. The wheels seemed like they’d be fine when it was empty, but were very difficult to pull and maneuver when it was packed. I had to buy a new bag just to get home. Since I planned ahead to be ready for my trip, the return time has passed. Not a happy traveler at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this - just buy a samsonite
customer_reviews.text: At first, this kenneth cole knockoff of samsonites awesome hard case rollers appeared to be of similar quality and like build. I didnt use it at the airport for more than 10 minutes before I wanted to throw it in the trash. Doesnt roll correctly, topples over, cannot handle weight on the top porting of messenger bags. I am surprised it made it through the trip where it was only used to transport items while walking through airport.
customer_reviews.author: Foutch

customer_reviews.title: Great little suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product when I found myself traveling more and carrying a gym bag around. This suitcase is lightweight, fits a good amount of stuff in it (I fit a weeks worth of clothing in it and traveled to Europe with only this and my purse) and fits under the seat on most airplanes. This item has made traveling so much easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nina G

customer_reviews.title: I love the way the suitcase rolls on all four wheels
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the suitcase rolls on all four wheels. When you have to checked bags and your carry on and personal item, it makes it a whole lot easier to get from place to place. I strapped my two checked bags together with the handles on the outside and piled my carry on and personal bag in the space between the two handles. easy peazy. That also works as a nice walking aid for those who are mobility challenged to be able to walk and handle their bags.
customer_reviews.author: KJM

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I was flying standby so bought this. My sister laughed when she saw it stating that I could have bought one much bigger and still made it in the above seat storage but I didn't want to chance it. I just made sure my duffel bag that went with it was pretty big. I had a broken toe and wearing a bootie so was glad I had this light weight case. I was in L.A. for three days. All good.
customer_reviews.author: SweetP

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase for the right price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carry-on suitcase. It's small but very roomy and the layout of the interior makes it easy to carry a lot of clothing. It also fits in the overheads of even small planes like the Embraer E175 and is very light. I've only used it a few times but it rolls well, takes a shortfall without issue, and hardly makes any noise. I tend to be pretty hard on carry-on luggage and go through about one a year but this one feels like it's going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: For the price? worth it.
customer_reviews.text: i was debating on dropping around $800 on a really nice bag since i travel 6x annually around the globe. last bag i had finally fell apart after 10 years of service (and it only cost $400). honestly, i have taken this on 2 trips thus far and it seems fine. i'm sure the roller wheels will be the first to go but so far i'm sure it will last me another year or so and i'll probably just buy another one of these. i can't see dropping near $1000 dollars on a piece of luggage the way these clowns at the airports treat things.
customer_reviews.author: mlannoo

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage!
customer_reviews.text: We had soft-sided Samsonite luggage that never fit in the overhead bins because I always jammed too much stuff in it. I had wanted hard luggage and finally came across these on Amazon. We took them on a flight last week and loved them. My husband and I both thought the wheels worked wonderfully. Stowing in the overhead bin was a breeze. They were easy to pack and everything stayed neat. The bags looked great when we got home. No scratches or ugly scuffs. I think the positive reviews are very accurate for this bag. I loved it so much I recommended it to my mom who is going to buy one too.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice suitcase, questionable handles
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot! Having a hard case makes me worry less about it getting dirty, and I was way more comfortable packing fragile items. I don’t love the handles, though. They don’t seem super durable and I’m worried about them pulling off. The outside got a little scratched on the one I checked for a flight, which bummed me out a bit for my first time using it. But it’s roomy and otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This pretty and smooth rolling suitcase holds a surprising amount of clothing, shoes and travel necessities. I was able to pack for 2 weeks traveling in the Mideast, and was even able to squeeze in a few gifts to take home. Granted, I only had to pack a couple of sweaters, but most of my skirts were long and my tops also had long sleeves, and I had a couple of hats to ward off the days of hot sun. I never had a problem taking it on board the aircraft. If you like rose gold, this is the suitcase for you.
customer_reviews.author: Micawber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my gentleman amigo for when we travel. It's a great masculine color that isn't the typical black that everyone has, but still is neutral. Perfect size for TSA approved carryon and the hard case is great because there's less chance for smashing of the suitcase. The rollers glide so easily in any direction = case can be pulled, pushed or rolled along the side of ya as you walk. Definitely recommended! Happy travels!
customer_reviews.author: KeeGSPharmD

customer_reviews.title: Good Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these - one for me, the wife and son for our Christmas trip to England. Very spacious, held boots, sweaters, toiletries - everything we needed for a week in the cold weather. The handle and wheels work well so moving them along is easy. It's hard to believe this "plastic" material will last long - but it survived 4 flights and 8,000 miles - so that's a good sign. Side note - three of these will NOT fit in the back of an Audi A3 hatchback - they do take up quite a bit of room.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Cara Mandart

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great just got it today. It is light with a big inside for lots of storage space. I did a test packing and I can fit enough clothing for 2 and half weeks. 20 tee shirts 9 jeans 15 shorts 3 bathing suits 4 dress pants 4 dress shirts 2 pairs flip flops 2 sneakers 1 nice dress shoes also cleaning products. I bought the carryon one as well and I can fit 8 days in there. Keep in mind I back tight and I am always under weight. Log roll jeans shorts underwear socks can be wrapped in jeans shorts underwear takes less space up. Wheels work great ran it in stone and sand
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Finally Luggage the Airlines Can’t Ruin
customer_reviews.text: I travel often and wanted something durable...This luggage has been put through the test...I’m happy to report that after a year and 4 trips from California to Washington State (round trip w/plane changes) it still looks great...I have 2 big ones and 1 carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: My Second Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The Reaction has been great. I killed my first one by loading it up with 70lb of stuff. The wheels couldn't handle it. I replaced the worst wheel with an aftermarket replacement. Now good as new. These are pretty durable. Like other reasonably (<$100) priced luggage, the wheels don't have bearings. I am going to replace the wheels of both bags with wheels with bearings. TSA has wrecked the zipper pulls twice and the entire zipper once. I repaired myself in both cases.
customer_reviews.author: David Termohlen

customer_reviews.title: Tough.  Good zippers.  Good wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Six international trips so far with multiple plane changes on each - excellent suitcase. Tough. Good zippers. Good wheels. This suitcase has been checked through 5 different airlines; there has never been an oversize charge. A few reviewers mentioned the exterior main zipper and fabric around it allowed too much slack when picking up the suitcase (sags excessively on one side) - yes...there is movement around the zipper area, but it is minor, and never causes any problem. Note to an entrepreneur: other travelers have told me they would pay extra for a suitcase with two interior zipper compartments - one zipper compartment on each half of the interior. The Kenneth Cole has one.
customer_reviews.author: stephen the constructive critic

customer_reviews.title: Great little suitcase, used with ease on several LCCs
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from two weeks, 3 continents, and 4 countries using this carry-on. It was fantastic. Held up well with 4 packing cubes on one side and all other miscellaneous shoes etc zipped into the other side. For those interested--I flew RyanAir, EasyJet, and Norwegian Air during this trip and did not have to pay a checked bag fee. The gate agents paid no attention to my little bag.
customer_reviews.author: MJ A

customer_reviews.title: I really like this suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this suitcase, although I will be acquiring its big sisters. I highly recommend this case but be realistic about your needs in regard to size-I wish that I’d initially ordered the larger case. I’m not a light packer, so this suitcase alone did not meet all of my needs for my weekend trip, (even without the extra pair of shoes). But this case was great for traveling through a crowded train station & airport. It had such great ease of use that I will be replacing my entire set of suitcases. The inside divider was great for separating items packed and this case is quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than max carry-on size.
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I was expecting--smaller than my hardshell spinner I have from a different company. It is even smaller than the soft wheeled suitcase we used before, so my husband is just going to give it to our toddler son to use. He wanted one as big as mine, which is also carry-on approved. I didn't want to deal with return hassle so I'm just going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: jamierose

customer_reviews.title: Cheap handle that rattles apart
customer_reviews.text: I've flown with this carry on fewer than 6 times and I've maybe used it on another dozen car trips in the past year. First, the shell is rugged and I've not had any zipper issues. However, the retractable handle has broken multiple times (I keep repairing it) as the screws keeping rattling loose, rendering it unable to be pulled properly and I end up having to carry it through the airport. I would not buy this again. If you don't travel often, you can probably go with something a little less expensive and save some cash. If you travel often, spend a little more and get something better made.
customer_reviews.author: Gragg

customer_reviews.title: 3 trips, 1 year 4 months of use... didn't last very long. 3rd time was a disaster.
customer_reviews.text: One of the zipper tabs fell off on the 2nd trip. 3rd trip to Beijing airport was horrible, the other passengers actually gasped as the Kenneth Cole bag came out of the ramp onto the carousel in large yellow plastic container with the contents for everyone to see. The zipper had split open and everything fell out. This is really just an average, generic Chinese-made suitcase you could find at any discount retail store with a Kenneth Cole logo. Make sure you use luggage straps with this suitcase, I wouldn't travel without it.
customer_reviews.author: JoeC

product_meta.title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Out Of Bounds 3-Piece Lightweight Hardside 4-Wheel Spinner Luggage Set: 20" Carry-On, 24", & 28"
product_meta.description: Size:3-Piece Set (20", 24", & 28")| Color:Rose GoldTravel in style and with ease of mind with this 3-piece 20”/24"/28” hardside 4-wheel spinner luggage set from Kenneth Cole Reaction’s “Out of Bounds” collection. The three piece set includes a 20” carry-on size, a 24" checked size, and a larger 28” checked suitcase size. Each piece is packed with features including a spacious fully lined interior, molded corner guard reinforcements for maximum impact resistance, garment restraints to keep your contents in place, and molded side feet that allow the suitcase to stand upright on its side. Multi-directional 4-wheel spinners also allow for a smooth 360-degree rotation over any terrain allowing you to get where you’re going faster. The dependable Out of Bounds 3-piece lightweight hardside 4-wheel spinner luggage set is perfect for travelers whom value both style and function. (20" Carry-On Dimensions: 21.75”H x 14.5”W x 8.5”D). (20" Internal Packing Dimensions: 20.0” H x 13.25” W x 7.5” D). (24" Overall Dimensions: 26.0” H x 18.5” W x 10.25” D). (24" Internal Packing Dimensions: 24.0"H x 17.5"L x 9.25"D). (28" Overall Dimensions: 29.5” H x 20.5” W x 11.75” D). (28" Internal Packing Dimensions: 28.0” H x 19.0” W x 10.25” D). (20"/24"/28" Weight: 6.25 lbs, 8.4 lbs, 9.6 lbs). (Set Weight: 24.25 lbs). Backed by a manufacturer 10-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: ✅ EFFORTLESS HANDLING: (i) Multi-directional 4-wheel spinners allow smooth 360° degree movement on any terrain for complete mobility free-weight rolling (ii) Four molded side feet allow luggage to stand upright on its side (iii) Retractable push-button telescoping handle with two lock positions for ultimate control and maneuverability (iv) Top and side easy grab handles.

✅ ORGANIZED COMPARTMENTS: (i) Two spacious fully lined compartments allow for double sided packing (ii) Large interior organizer zipper pocket to store smaller items (iii) Garment restraint straps help hold clothes and contents in place.

✅ LIGHTWEIGHT & DURABLE: (i) 20": 6.25 lbs / 24": 8.4 lbs / 28": 9.6 lbs (ii) Durable, lightweight, and water-resistant hardshell (iii) Easily cleaned. (iv) Molded corner guard reinforcements absorb/deflect shock for maximum impact resistance and lightweight construction helps you adhere to airline weight restrictions to avoid unneeded airport fees.

✅ PRODUCT SPECS: (20" Carry-On Dimensions: 21.75”H x 14.5”W x 8.5”D) (24" Overall Dimensions: 26.0” H x 18.5” W x 10.25” D) (28" Overall Dimensions: 29.5” H x 20.5” W x 11.75” D). Set Weight: 24.25 lbs.
✅ BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: (i) Backed by a manufacturer 10-year limited warranty. The perfect 3-Piece hardside luggage set for travelers whom value both style and function.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars4,953 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
